body:
GatsbyJS is a React-based, GraphQL powered static site generator. It uses powerful preconfiguration to build a website that uses only static files for incredibly fast page loads, service workers, code splitting, server-side rendering, intelligent image loading, asset optimization, and data prefetching. All out of the box!

Learn more at the [official site](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/)!

If you're looking to build a web app with Gatsby. Here are 50 awesome (and free!) Gatsby themes to kick-off the project ðŸŽ‰

## 1. LekoArts Cara

![LekoArts Cara Theme](/images/uploads/1-lekoarts.png)

Playful and Colorful One-Page portfolio featuring Parallax effects and animations. Especially designers and/or photographers will love this theme! Built with MDX and Theme UI.

* React Spring Parallax effects
* Theme UI-based theming
* CSS Animations and shapes
* Light/Dark mode

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/LekoArts/gatsby-starter-portfolio-cara/)

## 2. Portfolio Starter Jodie

![Portfolio Starter Jodie Theme](/images/uploads/2-portfolio-jodie.jpg)

Image-heavy photography portfolio with colorful accents & great typography

* Configurable with theming, CSS Grid & a yaml file for navigation
* Create your projects by editing a yaml file and putting images into a folder
* Shows your Instagram posts
* TypeScript
* Cypress for End-to-End testing
* react-spring for animations & transitions
* Uses styled-components + styled-system
* SEO with Sitemap, Schema.org JSONLD, Tags
* Responsive images with gatsby-image

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/LekoArts/gatsby-starter-portfolio-jodie/)

## 3. Dimension

![Dimension Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/3-gatsby-dimension.jpg)

A fully responsive, single-page React.js website template. Built using Gatsby.js and designed by HTML5 UP. Great for a quick profile or portfolio site.

[See more details](https://codebushi.com/gatsby-starters-and-themes/)

## 4. Gatsby Paradigm Shift

![Gatsby Paradigm Shift Theme](/images/uploads/4-gatsby-starter-paradigm.jpg)

Single page responsive site that's perfect for a personal portfolio or small showcase. Original design by HTML5 UP.

[See more details](https://github.com/codebushi/gatsby-starter-paradigm-shift)

## 5. JugglerX

![JugglerX Theme](/images/uploads/5-jugglerx.png)

Multi page/content-type starter using Markdown and SCSS. Serif is a beautiful small business theme for Gatsby. The theme is fully responsive, blazing fast and artfully illustrated.

* Graphql query in \`gatsby-node.js\` using aliases that creates pages and templates by content type based on the folder \`src/pages/services\`, \`src/pages/team\`
* SCSS
* Responsive design
* Bootstrap 4 grid and media queries only
* Responsive menu
* Royalty-free illustrations included
* SEO titles & meta using \`gatsby-plugin-react-helmet\`
* Eslint & Prettier

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/JugglerX/gatsby-serif-theme/)

## 6. Gatsby Theme Document

![Gatsby Theme Document](/images/uploads/6-gatsby-theme-document.jpg)

A Gatsby.js theme for creating documentation with MDX and Theme UI. Features multiple color modes and navigation that is created automatically. 

[See more details](https://github.com/codebushi/gatsby-theme-document)

## 7. Ginger

![Ginger Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/7-ginger.png)

Ginger beautiful Gatsby andÂ [WPGraphQL](https://www.wpgraphql.com/)Â WordPress theme for bloggers, photographers and any lifestyle professionals looking for an amazing theme that's blazingly fast!Â 

[See more details](https://gatsbywpthemes.com/)

## 8. Gatsby Lander

![Gatsby Lander Theme](/images/uploads/8-gatsby-starter-lander.jpg)

An experimental Gatsby starter built usingÂ [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/). This single page website template is perfect for getting an idea out the door. With Tailwind CSS, it's very easy to customize the colors and styles of this landing page.

[See more details](https://github.com/codebushi/gatsby-starter-lander)

## 9. Gatsby Forty

![Gatsby Forty Theme](/images/uploads/9-template-gatsby-forty.jpg)

A colorful website template featuring a landing page, two hero banner styles, and a generic page. Built using Gatsby.js and designed by HTML5 UP.

[See more details](https://github.com/codebushi/gatsby-starter-forty)

## 10. Gatsby Strata

![Gatsby Strata Theme](/images/uploads/10-template-gatsby-strata.jpg)

This super simple site features a lightbox style photo gallery. Fully responsive and perfect for displaying your work. Designed by HTML5 UP.

[See more details](https://github.com/codebushi/gatsby-starter-strata)

## 11. Gatsby Stellar

![Gatsby Stellar Theme](/images/uploads/11-template-gatsby-stellar.jpg)

A scroll friendly, responsive site. Supports single or multiple pages. Has smooth scrolling to the different sections of the page. Designed by HTML5 UP.

[See more details](https://github.com/codebushi/gatsby-starter-stellar)

## 12. Gatsby Photon

![Gatsby Photon Theme](/images/uploads/12-template-gatsby-photon.jpg)

Great single page site that can be a landing page or a portfolio website. Custom grid elements made with CSS Grid! Original design by HTML5 UP.

[See more details](https://github.com/codebushi/gatsby-starter-photon)

## 13. Ghost & Gatsby

![Ghost & Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/13-ghost.jpg)

Build lightning-fast, modern publications with Ghost and Gatsby.

* Ghost integration with ready to go placeholder content and webhooks support
* Minimal responsive design
* Pagination for posts, tags, and authors
* SEO Friendly Meta
* JSON-LD Schema
* OpenGraph structured data
* Twitter Cards meta
* Sitemap Generation
* XML Sitemaps
* Progressive Web App
* Offline Support

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/TryGhost/gatsby-starter-ghost/)

## 14. Gatsby Netlify

![Gatsby Netlify Theme](/images/uploads/14-netlify.png)

Gatsby starter using Netlify CMS.

* Example of a website for a local developer meetup group
* NetlifyCMS used for easy data entry
* Mobile-friendly design
* SASS styling 
* Gatsby version 2

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/robertcoopercode/gatsby-netlify-cms/) 

## 15. Gatsby Material Kit React

![Gatsby Material Kit React Theme](/images/uploads/15-material-kit.jpg)

Adaptation of Material Kit React to Gatsby.

* 60 Handcrafted Components
* 4 Customized Plugins
* 3 Example Pages

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/WebCu/gatsby-material-kit-react/)

## 16. Blogger

![Blogger Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/16-blogger.jpg)

A Simple, clean and modern designed blog with firebase authentication feature and easily customizable code.

* Minimal and clean white layout
* Dynamic content from Contentful
* Blog post listing with previews (image + summary) for each blog post
* Disqus commenting system for each blog post
* Search post with keyword
* Firebase for Authentication
* Protected Routes with Authorization
* Contact form integration

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/aslammultidots/blogger/)

## 17. Gatsby Starter Theme

![Gatsby Starter Theme](/images/uploads/17-gatsby-starter-theme.jpg)

Polished Gatsby theme for a documentation site

* Prerendered static site
* Internationalization support by i18next
* Markdown-based documentation and menus
* Examples with live playground
* Unified Theme and Layout
* Easily customized header nav
* Built-in home page components

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/antvis/gatsby-starter-theme-antv/)

## 18. London Portfolio Template

![London Portfolio Template Gatsby](/images/uploads/18-london-portfolio.jpg)

A custom, image-centric theme for Gatsby.

* Post thumbnails in the homepage
* Built with PostCSS
* Made for image-centeric portfolios
* Based on London for Ghost

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/ImedAdel/gatsby-london/)

## 19. Gatsby Portfolio

![Gatsby Portfolio](/images/uploads/19-gatsby-portfolio.jpg)

Clean gird based Gatsby portfolio theme, with left side navigation and infinite scrolling.

* Simple portfolio to quick start a site with DatoCMS
* Contents and media from DatoCMS
* Custom Sass style
* SEO

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/datocms/gatsby-portfolio/)

## 20. Blog

![Blog Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/20-blog.jpg)

A blog with all the bells and whistles.

* Write blog posts into Markdown files (easy to format and content will not be married to any platform)
* Expandable
* Responsive and streamlined design.=
* Blazing fast UX
* Autogenerated tracedSVG image placeholders are stylized to create a smooth look and transition as the image loads without the page jumping around
* Posts organized by tags
* Teasers of posts are generated to front page with infinite scroll which gracefully degrades into pagination
* Allow readers to be notified of updates with RSS feed and email newsletter
* Contact Form

[See more details](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/starters/baobabKoodaa/blog/)

## 21. Tabor

![Tabor Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/21-tabor-min.png)

A slick portfolio and blog theme converted to a Gatsby theme.Â 

[See more details](https://gatsbywpthemes.com/)

## 22. Gatsby Kontent Paperbase

![Gatsby Kontent Paperbase Theme](/images/uploads/22-simply007-kontent-sample-app-gatsby-intranet-min.png)

Material UI Paperbase Starter for Gatsby with Kentico Kontent.

[See more details](https://github.com/Simply007/kontent-sample-app-gatsby-intranet)

## 23. DIY

![DIY Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/23-stackbit-stackbit-theme-diy-min.png)

DIY is a multi-page marketing theme with an advanced layout builder.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-diy)

## 24. Azimuth

![Azimuth Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/24-stackbit-stackbit-theme-azimuth-min.png)

Azimuth is a sleek marketing theme for startup and product sites.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-azimuth)

## 25. vHealth - Virtual healthcare

![vHealth Virtual healthcare Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/25-shantanu-deshmukh-vhealth-gatsby-min.png)

Modular and easy to use Gatsby template for a Healthcare Startup.

[See more details](https://github.com/shantanu-deshmukh/vhealth-gatsby)

## 26. Gatsby Markdown Material TypeScript/TSX Responsive Blog Starter

![Gatsby Markdown Material TypeScript/TSX Responsive Blog Starter](/images/uploads/26-stephen-cloud-gatsby-markdown-material-typescript-starter-min.png)

Markdown Material UI TypeScript/TSX.

[See more details](https://github.com/stephen-cloud/gatsby-markdown-material-typescript-starter)

## 27. Gatsby DevBlog

![Gatsby DevBlog](/images/uploads/27-ryanfitzgerald-devblog-min.png)

A fully customizable blog template designed for developers (or anyone else) wanting to get into blogging.

[See more details](https://github.com/RyanFitzgerald/devblog)

## 28. Intro

![Intro Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/28-wkocjan-gatsby-theme-intro-min.png)

Personal branding theme for developers.

[See more details](https://github.com/wkocjan/gatsby-theme-intro)

## 29. Planty

![Planty Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/29-snipcart-stackbit-theme-planty-min.png)

Planty is an e-commerce ready theme powered by Snipcart.

[See more details](https://github.com/snipcart/stackbit-theme-planty)

## 30. Gatsby Novela

![Gatsby Novela Theme](/images/uploads/30-narative-gatsby-theme-novela-min.png)

Welcome to Novela, the simplest way to start publishing with Gatsby.

[See more details ](https://github.com/narative/gatsby-theme-novela/)

## 31. Libris

![Libris Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/31-stackbit-stackbit-theme-libris-min.png)

Libris is a documentation theme.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-libris)

## 32. Vanilla

![Vanilla Gatsby Starter](/images/uploads/32-stackbit-stackbit-theme-vanilla-min.png)

A clean vanilla theme for Stackbit.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-vanilla)

## 33. Fresh

![Fresh Gatsby Starter](/images/uploads/33-stackbit-stackbit-theme-fresh-min.png)

Fresh is a personal theme with a blog for Stackbit.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-fresh)

## 34. Starter Stackbit

![Starter Stackbit Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/34-stackbit-stackbit-theme-starter-min.png)

A developer-focused starter theme for Stackbit.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-starter)

## 35. Fjord

![Fjord Starter Kit](/images/uploads/35-stackbit-stackbit-theme-fjord-min.png)

Fjord is a beautiful, minimal blog theme.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-fjord)

## 36. Exto

![Exto Starter Theme](/images/uploads/36-stackbit-stackbit-theme-exto-min.png)

Exto is portfolio and blog theme with a clean design.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-exto)

## 37. Ampersand

![Ampersand Theme](/images/uploads/37-stackbit-stackbit-theme-ampersand-min.png)

Ampersand is a Medium inspired blogging theme.

[See more details](https://github.com/stackbit/stackbit-theme-ampersand)

## 38. Gatsby Prismic Starter Prist

![Gatsby Prismic Starter Prist](/images/uploads/38-margueriteroth-gatsby-prismic-starter-prist-min.png)

Gatsby starter for portfolios and blogs using Prismic CMS.

[See more details](https://github.com/margueriteroth/gatsby-prismic-starter-prist)

## 39. Airtable listing theme for Gatsby

![Airtable listing theme for Gatsby](/images/uploads/39-wkocjan-gatsby-airtable-listing-min.png)

Gatsby starter theme integrated with Airtable.

[See more details](https://github.com/wkocjan/gatsby-airtable-listing)

## 40. Gatsby Contentful Blog and Portfolio

![Gatsby Contentful Blog and Portfolio](/images/uploads/40-escapemanuele-gatsby-contentful-blog-portfolio-min.png)

A Gatsby starter for a portfolio with a blog, using Contentful as the CMS.

[See more details](https://github.com/escapemanuele/gatsby-contentful-blog-portfolio)

## 41. Gatsby Starter for Scientists

![Gatsby Starter for Scientists](/images/uploads/41-knightjdr-gatsby-starter-scientist-min.png)

A portfolio or lab website for Scientists built with Gatsby.

[See more details](https://github.com/knightjdr/gatsby-starter-scientist)

## 42. Gatsby Pocket

![Gatsby Pocket Theme](/images/uploads/42-molebox-gatsby-theme-pocket-min.png)

A Gatsby theme that adds a pocket to your website.

[See more details](https://github.com/molebox/gatsby-theme-pocket)

## 43. Gatsby Starter Fractal

![Gatsby Starter Fractal Theme](/images/uploads/43-anubhavsrivastava-gatsby-starter-fractal-min.png)

Gatsby.js V2 starter template based on Fractal by HTML5 UP.

[See more details](https://github.com/anubhavsrivastava/gatsby-starter-fractal)

## 44. Gatsby Starter Nehalem

![Gatsby Starter Nehalem Theme](/images/uploads/44-nehalist-gatsby-starter-nehalem-min.png)

Out-of-the-box:

* Fully responsive
* Highly optimized (Lighthouse score ~400)
* SEO optimized (with open graph, Twitter Card, JSON-LD, RSS and sitemap)
* Syntax highlighting
* Search functionality
* Multi navigations
* Static pages
* Fully typed with TypeScript
* Tagging
* Theming
* Customizable

[See more details](https://github.com/nehalist/gatsby-starter-nehalem)

## 45. Bonneville

![Bonneville Gatsby Theme](/images/uploads/45-bagseye-bonneville-min.png)

A simple, clean GatsbyJS starter for those looking to get up and running with Gatsby

[See more details](https://github.com/bagseye/bonneville)

## 46. Gatsby Starter Zenii

![Gatsby Starter Zenii](/images/uploads/46-thebakerdev-gatsby-starter-zenii-min.png)

A one-page Gatsby starter built with Tailwindcss and Postcss.

[See more details](https://github.com/thebakerdev/gatsby-starter-zenii)

## 47. Gatsby Starter Interviews

![Gatsby Starter Interviews Theme](/images/uploads/47-rmagon-gatsby-starter-interviews-min.png)

A responsive Gatsby starter for structured Q&A Interviews.

[See more details](https://github.com/rmagon/gatsby-starter-interviews)

## 48. Gatsby Crafty Theme

![Gatsby Crafty Theme](/images/uploads/48-simplecode-io-gatsby-crafty-theme-min.png)

A clean & minimal Gatsby theme!

[See more details](https://github.com/simplecode-io/gatsby-crafty-theme)

## 49. Gatsby Starter Newage

![Gatsby Starter Newage](/images/uploads/49-anubhavsrivastava-gatsby-starter-newage-min.png)

Gatsby.js V2 starter template based on New Age by startbootstrap.

[See more details](https://github.com/anubhavsrivastava/gatsby-starter-newage)

## 50. Gatsby All In

![Gatsby All In Theme](/images/uploads/50-gherciu-gatsby-all-in-min.png)

A GatsbyJs starter that includes the most popular js libraries, already pre-configured and ready for use.

[See more details](https://github.com/Gherciu/gatsby-all-in)

short: A roundup of the best free Gatsby templates.
